TopicTitle: Mod UI Box - How to move it?

Articles.Content:
I apologize if someone has covered this elsewhere, but after a couple hours of searching, I still can't find an answer.

How do I move the UI window that has the buttons for the different Mods? It is currently in the center of the screen and driving me crazy. I've tried dragging, right-clicking, alt, & ctrl with no luck so far.

You're talking about blizzy78's toolbar. Click the little downward-pointing triangle, which will get you a menu. Choose unlock/move/whatever, drag to move, drag on the corner to resize, when done click the triangle again to lock.
Check the FAQ section in this post: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60863

Check the FAQ section in this post: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60863

Thank you! It appears it got installed with one of the other mods I updated for .23, so I never realized it was a separate one. Once I downloaded the latest version from your link and updated it, the arrow is in the corner of the box and I was able to move and resize the box.
